title: Update Expert Profile & Landing Page for Everyday Device Support Focus

requirements.summary: Update LoginPrompt hero headline and description to reflect everyday device support (laptops, desktops, mobiles, printers) with Jaipur-based expert positioning
acceptanceCriteria: The hero/landing page displays the exact headline: 'Tech Support Expert | Fast Fixes for Laptops, Desktops, Mobiles & Printers | 10+ Years Experience'
The description on the landing page is 3–4 lines and matches the specified copy exactly
No references to AWS, cloud, or old headline text remain on the landing page

file_operations.description: Replace the existing headline with 'Tech Support Expert | Fast Fixes for Laptops, Desktops, Mobiles & Printers | 10+ Years Experience' and update the description to the exact copy: 'Jaipur-based pro fixing your laptops, desktops, mobiles, and printers remotely or on-site. Quick, affordable solutions for home/office. Message for same-day help!' Remove any AWS or cloud-related messaging from the component.

requirements.summary: Add a Skills/Services section to the LoginPrompt with four bullet-point skills covering device troubleshooting, mobile repair, printer support, and remote assistance
acceptanceCriteria: A clearly labeled 'Skills' or 'Services' section appears on the landing page
All four bullet items are displayed exactly as specified
No cloud/AWS-related skills appear in this section

file_operations.description: Add a new 'Skills' or 'Services' section below the hero description displaying exactly four bullet points: 'Laptop/Desktop troubleshooting & upgrades', 'Mobile repair/setup (Android/iOS)', 'Printer connectivity & ink issues', 'Remote support via chat/video'. Use consistent styling with the rest of the component and ensure the section is visually distinct.

requirements.summary: Add a Pricing/Services section to LoginPrompt displaying three service tiers in INR with 24–48 hour turnaround promise
acceptanceCriteria: A Pricing or Services section is visible on the landing page with exactly three tiers
All prices are displayed in INR (₹) with the specified amounts
Each tier card/row includes a '24–48 hour turnaround' note

file_operations.description: Add a new 'Pricing' or 'Services' section with three clearly defined service tiers: 'Basic Diagnostic: ₹500', 'Full Laptop/Mobile Fix: ₹1,500', 'Printer Setup: ₹800'. Each tier must display the price in INR (₹) and include a '24–48 hour turnaround' note. Use card or column layout for visual clarity and ensure consistent spacing with other sections.

requirements.summary: Add a Testimonials section to LoginPrompt with at least three short client quotes displayed as styled testimonial cards
acceptanceCriteria: A Testimonials section appears on the landing page with at least 3 testimonial cards
The two specified quotes are present verbatim
Each card includes a quote and a placeholder customer name/attribution

file_operations.description: Add a 'Testimonials' section containing at least three testimonial cards. Include these exact quotes: 'Fixed my printer in 30 mins!', 'Laptop running smooth again', and one additional quote about mobile repair (e.g., 'Phone screen replaced same day!'). Each card must display the quote text and a placeholder customer name/attribution. Style the cards consistently with the rest of the component using shadow, padding, and proper typography.

requirements.summary: Add banner and device icons strip to LoginPrompt using generated images (device-fixes-banner, laptop-icon, phone-icon, printer-icon) from frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Three device icons (laptop, phone, printer) are displayed on the landing page
A banner or prominent element shows the text 'Device Fixes Done Right'
All images are loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated

file_operations.description: Add a banner element displaying the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/device-fixes-banner.dim_1200x400.png with the tagline 'Device Fixes Done Right'. Below the banner, add an inline icons strip rendering the three device icons: frontend/public/assets/generated/laptop-icon.dim_64x64.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/phone-icon.dim_64x64.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/printer-icon.dim_64x64.png. Ensure images are loaded from the exact workspace paths and rendered with appropriate sizing and spacing.

requirements.summary: Add a Portfolio/Work Samples section to LoginPrompt showcasing 2–3 device fix scenarios using generated portfolio images from frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: A Portfolio or Work Samples section is visible on the landing page
2–3 image cards are displayed with captions describing each fix scenario
All images are loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated

file_operations.description: Add a 'Portfolio' or 'Work Samples' section displaying 2–3 image cards with the generated portfolio images: frontend/public/assets/generated/printer-setup-before-after.dim_600x400.png (caption: 'Before/After: Printer Setup'), frontend/public/assets/generated/mobile-repair-demo.dim_600x400.png (caption: 'Mobile Screen Repair Demo'), and frontend/public/assets/generated/laptop-fix-demo.dim_600x400.png (caption: 'Laptop Upgrade Complete'). Each card must display the image and its corresponding caption. Ensure images are loaded from the exact workspace paths and styled consistently with proper aspect ratios.
